page.title: 11TRADE SHOPS LOCAL 1985
page.content: Kibworth Beauchamp is well served by local shops. Some of these businesses maintain a continuous, thriving retail trade whilst others tend to be short term ventures and change from one type of shop to another. One problem for some shops is the proximity of Leicester and the abundance of motor cars in the village. Nevertheless, there has been no significant decline in the number of shops in Kibworth over the past ten years. At the present time there are 32 shops in Kibworth Beauchamp, one bank, three garages and three building societies are represented. The shops mentioned above are listed on the following page.
